doc.title: Draftdodging
doc.plot: Berg Marsh is on the treadmill of life. The right schools, the right job, the right apartment. He follows the path that young men are supposed to follow. Or are they? Berg decides to dodge today's draft of success climbing and relocate to the peace of New Hampshire. With his girlfriend and attractive foursome of cousins in-tow, Berg and company sift through the elements of his past in search of a new future.
